jobDescription: Job DescriptionJob Title: Lead TechnicianReports To: Installation ManagerDepartment:  InstallationLocation:  Milpitas, CaliforniaWhat Northland DoesNorthland is a world-class global security integrator with offices in the United States, United Kingdom, Singapore, China and India.
